Introduction

Diva was a three-member girl group. They were under various labels throughout their 8 years; initially debuting in Woongjin Music, then moving onto Cream Records, Jam Entertainment, Kiss Co., BM Entertainment, and lastly C&C Media. They debuted on August 29, 1997 with their first studio album, Funky Diva. They disbanded in 2005 to pursue in solo activities.
